join hortbot 99 foobar 1


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!set urban
send hortbot #foobar [HB] urban is set to false.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!set urban off
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Urban Dictionary is already disabled.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!set urban on
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Urban Dictionary is now enabled.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!set urban on
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Urban Dictionary is already enabled.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!set urban
send hortbot #foobar [HB] urban is set to true.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!set urban off
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Urban Dictionary is now disabled.
